body:
I have a spack.yaml file describing an environment. This file contains the following lines to add a namespace:

```
spack:
  ...
  repos:
  - /home/mdorier/sds-repo # adds the "mochi" namespave
```

When I deactivate the environment, I'm getting this warning:
```
==> Warning: Unknown namespace: mochi
==> Warning: Could not fully deactivate view due to missing package or repo, shell environment may be corrupt.
```

I don't know what in the shell environment may be corrupt, or if I can safely ignore this warning, but this might be something to address.
title: "Unknown namespace" after deactivating an environment
